column4: yup tones, I just realized I couldn't even play the .amr file, I'm installing mencoder and see what happens.
tones man, vlc player doesn't work for .amr file, and the same with totem.... totem says "Could not determine type of stream"
damn :)
I'll pass it again from the usb.
I'm afraid I'll have to switch to windows to see if the situation changes.
my uncle is gonna kill me.
bbl I'm gonna switch to see.
if the files a drmed there is not much you can do. you need a compatible player and the keys
yes like that of dvd or apple itunes files
what graphic card do you have ?
how did you installed the drivers for it ?
?? via System>Admin>hardware drivers ? or used envyng ? or the run file from nvidia.com ?
i'm asking how you installed the drivers of you nvida driver originaly when you first installed the system
becouse if you used the run from nvidia or envyng and there was a kernel upgrade you wil have to reinstall the drivers
you will have to find out how th drivers where installed in the first place
not bad per se; but may not help
install pastebinit and paste /var/log/Xorg.0.log
yes; as i said we need to know how you (or whoever did it) installed the nvidia drivers
we will have more info if you pastebin the file i asked to
i asked you two pices of info you provided none. i still do not know how the driver was installed nor i could see the X server error log... i can not help without info
install pastebinit and paste /var/log/Xorg.0.log
